title: Problem with logs and black screen
body:
Hi, i have win 10 on my comp, and i played normally before a month. Since then i didn't played and yesterday i patched, and after that LoL went dark before i launched. Tried to fix it on all the ways, because that happend to me when i first got windows 10, and after it didn't word i reinstalled whole game. Now i can't even patch because of this logs issue. 
Please help me, give me all the help you have! :D [IMG]http://i64.tinypic.com/14y1ikw.png[/IMG]

replies.body:
It looks like you're most likely running into this due to a permissions or installation problem with League. To ensure League is operating with the correct privileges, I recommend launching from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file as admin (right-click, *run as administrator*) from inside your installation directory (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends).

Please let me know if this resolve the issue for you.
